resources.string: Welcome to DoorDroid, the smart Doorbell for HomeAssistant.\nFor this app to work, you will need a working SIP server like Asterisk. We will also ask for some permissions so that this phone can make SIP calls. Please accept them all. Last but not least, we will need some HomeAssistant info.

Welcome to DoorDroid, the smart Doorbell for HomeAssistant.\nWe\'re sorry to say that this device does not support SIP calling and DoorDroid will not work on it. Hopefully you will find another use for this Android mobile.
SIP username (the part before the @, without sip)
The hostname or the ip-address of your server, including port (e.g.: 192.168.1.30:5060)
HomeAssistant hostname or ip-address including port (e.g.: 192.168.1.2:8123)
The name of the HomeAssistant boolean doorbell entity
The SIP username of HomeAssistant which will be called by default
